column4: hola, I have a silly question. I am trying to get into a folder that I have sitting in the home directory and every time I try to cd into it I get /foldername no such file or directory when I do the ll I see the folder but when I do cd /foldername no dice. any help? merci!!!
is the root folder, ~/ is /home/yourusername, ~/foldername is /home/yourusername/foldername
